home.modalText:
Welcome! This study explores how climate data affects civic decision-making.
You'll be presented with a local climate issue requiring resource allocation. After sharing your initial thoughts, you'll view climate visualizations for your area and chat briefly with our AI assistant. Finally, you'll make a decision and explain your reasoning.
 The process takes about 15 minutes. Your anonymized responses will help advance climate communication research.
Click 
 "Begin" when ready.
